overview: A young girl is seduced and raped by an older middle class man in Victorian England. After moving on with her path, she gets married. All is well until her husband discovers her past. Leading her on a life of wandering, murder, and execution.
tagline: THOMAS HARDY'S Masterpiece of Literature Made Into a Masterpiece of the Screen Under the Direction of MARSHALL NEILAN
title: Tess of the D'Urbervilles
